actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to exempt certain newspaper advertisements of lotteries which are legal under applicable State law, or sponsored by a State, from the list of nonmailable matter.

summary.text: Exempts, under present Federal statutes, specified newspaper advertisements of lotteries which are legal under applicable State law, or sponsored by a State, from the Postal Services list of nonmailable matter.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to exempt certain newspaper advertisements of lotteries which are legal under applicable State law, or sponsored by a State, from the list of nonmailable matter.
